Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill, your favorite Alexa routines can be triggered just by tapping walls, tables, and other ordinary surfaces in your home. 

Now you can use Knocki to control all your favorite smart home devices that work with Alexa including smart lights, switches, door locks, and much more!

For example, create a secret knock to unlock your patio door, or set up a bedtime routine to turn off your bedroom lights and set your alarm just by gently tapping your nightstand.

HOW DO I GET STARTED?

When you turn on this skill in the Alexa app, you’ll be prompted to sign in in to your Knocki account.

After you’ve signed in to your Knocki account via the Alexa. then go to the Knocki app and add the “Alexa” task to an existing or new gesture. When you add the Alexa Task within the Knocki app, you’ll be prompted to pick a unique Alexa ID matching the Alexa skill device ID that you select in the Alexa app.

To enable Knocki as a trigger for an Alexa routine, navigate within the Alexa app to “More - Routines. Then create a new routine or choose a routine you’ve already created. Then, select “When this happens” - “smart home” and as the trigger, choose the unique ID that you already selected within the Knocki app.
